Detailed Description

Main packet buffer struct.

Field Documentation

u8_t pbuf::flags

misc flags

Referenced by pbuf_free(), and pbuf_realloc().

u8_t pbuf::if_idx

For incoming packets, this contains the input netif's index.

u16_t pbuf::len

length of this buffer

Referenced by inet_chksum_pbuf(), pbuf_cat(), pbuf_copy(), pbuf_copy_partial(), pbuf_dechain(), pbuf_free_header(), pbuf_memcmp(), pbuf_put_at(), pbuf_realloc(), pbuf_remove_header(), pbuf_take(), pbuf_take_at(), and pbuf_try_get_at().

struct pbuf* pbuf::next

next pbuf in singly linked pbuf chain

Referenced by inet_chksum_pbuf(), pbuf_alloc(), pbuf_cat(), pbuf_clen(), pbuf_coalesce(), pbuf_copy(), pbuf_copy_partial(), pbuf_dechain(), pbuf_free(), pbuf_free_header(), pbuf_memcmp(), pbuf_realloc(), pbuf_take(), and pbuf_take_at().

void* pbuf::payload

pointer to the actual data in the buffer

Referenced by inet_chksum_pbuf(), pbuf_alloc(), pbuf_copy(), pbuf_copy_partial(), pbuf_put_at(), pbuf_realloc(), pbuf_remove_header(), pbuf_take(), pbuf_take_at(), and pbuf_try_get_at().

LWIP_PBUF_REF_T pbuf::ref

the reference count always equals the number of pointers that refer to this pbuf.

This can be pointers from an application, the stack itself, or pbuf->next pointers from a chain.

Referenced by pbuf_free(), and pbuf_ref().

u16_t pbuf::tot_len

total length of this buffer and all next buffers in chain belonging to the same packet.

For non-queue packet chains this is the invariant: p->tot_len == p->len + (p->next? p->next->tot_len: 0)

Referenced by pbuf_cat(), pbuf_clone(), pbuf_copy(), pbuf_dechain(), pbuf_memcmp(), pbuf_memfind(), pbuf_realloc(), pbuf_remove_header(), pbuf_strstr(), pbuf_take(), and pbuf_take_at().

u8_t pbuf::type_internal

a bit field indicating pbuf type and allocation sources (see PBUF_TYPE_FLAG_*, PBUF_ALLOC_FLAG_* and PBUF_TYPE_ALLOC_SRC_MASK)
